summary: This document is the curriculum vitae of Jennifer L. Naso, a forensic document examiner. It details her education, work experience at Riley Welch LaPorte & Associates and the U.S. Secret Service, specialized training, and professional qualifications. The document appears to be an exhibit, likely submitted to establish her credentials as an expert witness.

connections.description: Jennifer L. Naso attended a workshop presented by Gerry Laporte in 2006. Laporte's surname is shared with the firm 'Riley Welch LaPorte & Associates' where Naso worked.

keyFacts: Jennifer L. Naso is a qualified forensic document examiner who has testified as an expert witness in federal and county courts.
Her professional experience includes work for the U.S. Secret Service as a Document Analyst from 2006 to 2011.
She has extensive specialized training in questioned document examination, including workshops on Arabic handwriting, charred documents, and signature analysis.
The document is labeled 'EXHIBIT K', indicating it was formally submitted as evidence, likely to establish her expertise in a legal proceeding.
